title: Simple Fresh Mode Test - Create Hello File
description: Test fresh mode operation by creating a simple file in an empty workspace. This verifies that fresh workspaces work correctly after our path dependency fixes.
instruction:
Create a simple test to verify fresh mode workspace functionality:

1. Create a file named 'hello_fresh.txt' in the current directory
2. Write 'Hello from fresh mode!' as the content
3. Verify the file was created successfully
4. Report success status

This is a simple test to verify that fresh mode (empty workspace) operations work correctly with our new workspace validation logic.
